schedule = {}

    "DailySchedules": [
        {
            "DayOfWeek": 0,
            "Switchpoints": [
                {"heatSetpoint": 20.0, "TimeOfDay": "06:00:00"},
                {"heatSetpoint": 18.0, "TimeOfDay": "08:00:00"},
                {"heatSetpoint": 20.0, "TimeOfDay": "18:00:00"},
